vgp.curve.surface

Class PaSurfCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • vgp.object.PsApplet
              • vgp.curve.surface.PaSurfCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PaSurfCurve
extends PsApplet
    Demo applet computes differential geometric curves on smooth surfaces. Applet is intended as demo on how to use project PjCurve.
    See Also:
    PvViewer, Serialized Form

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Standalone application support. The main() method acts as the applet's entry point when it is run as a standalone application. It is ignored if the applet is run from within an HTML page.
